location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 66 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor, Political and Secret Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter states that a duplicate of item IOR/R/15/1/3, pp 122-123 is enclosed (it is not contained in the file) and reports that no noteworthy developments have taken place since that letter was sent.
